Frankfurt RS-232/TTL module

Document reversion: 2016-11-28 change log
Copyright © 2000-2015 Grodans Paradis AB, <info@grodansparadis.com>

This documentation is for the Frankfurt RS-232 module and the Frankfurt TTL module. Both modules are available for international purchase from the FrogShop.

  • Getting Started
  • Hardware
  • CAN4VSCP cabling
  • Installing the module
  • The verbose mode
  • The CAN4VSCP mode
  • The SLCAN mode
  • Replacing the firmware
